name: Stick man vs. Human
description:
All of a sudden, in the peaceful stickman world, every stickman's part of their DNA changed to human DNA. the half human stickmans are more powerful and violent than normal stick mans. you are the only stick man left who hasn't gone through the horrible mutation. You must defend your only house from cruel half human stick mans. Good Luck

Control -

a & d to move left and right,

space to jump

 drag to view outside,

right click to shoot.

Credits -

Everything made by myself :)
